callUuid.description: The unique identifier for the call.

timeStart.description: The start time of the call as a timestamp.

timeEnd.description: The end time of the call as a timestamp.

callerNumber.description: The phone number of the caller.

internalCall.description: Indicates if the call is internal.

pickup.description: Indicates if the call was picked up.

pickupFirstName.description: The first name of the person who picked up the call.

pickupLastName.description: The last name of the person who picked up the call.

pickupAccountId.description: The account ID of the person who picked up the call.

pickupTime.description: The timestamp when the call was picked up.

outgoing.description: Indicates if the call is outgoing.

callFinished.description: Indicates if the call is finished.

calledAccountId.description: The account ID that was called.

calledType.description: The type of the called entity (e.g., USER, GROUP).

timeStart.description: The start time of the call step as a timestamp.

timeEnd.description: The end time of the call step as a timestamp.

connected.description: Indicates if the call step was connected.

calledName.description: The name of the called entity.

calledNumber.description: The phone number of the called entity.

agentInfo.description: Details of the agents involved in the call.

accountId.description: The account ID of the agent.

busy.description: Indicates if the agent is busy.

dnd.description: Indicates if the agent has Do Not Disturb enabled.

online.description: Indicates if the agent is online.

pickupUsers.description: List of users who picked up the call.

ringingUsers.description: List of users who were ringing.

waiting.description: Number of seconds the caller was waiting.
